page.title: 13Trails at the Country Park
page.content:
Around Durlston Country Park there are many trails which can be followed with information to assist the visitor, these include:
THE STONE TRAIL - As its name suggests this trail concentrates on geology and Purbeck stone and its use in the past; while drawing attention to its use for stone walling renovations taking place throughout the Park at present.
THE FARMLAND TRAIL - This new trail was designed to encourage visitors to explore the more remote area of the Park. Much of this land is leased to local farmers, but is managed by the Park. Throughout this trail markers with interesting titles such as "Hay bales and Hoverflies","Foxes and Fertilizers", can be seen.
